name: Superfluid
description: Superfluid is a real-time settlement solution for the 21st century. By harnessing the true strength of blockchain technology, we create a paradigm-shifting settlement solution that will boost the payments industry.

team.title: Co-Founder & COO
team.name: Michele D'Aliessi
team.bioHtml: Building realtime finance @Superfluid

jobs.title: Frontend Engineer
jobs.description:
**About the job**
We are looking for a talented Frontend Engineer to joing our team as full time employee, intrigued by designing the key components of our new online payments product to be launched soon. 

If you also know the basics of blockchain technology (Web3) and backend development that's a BIG PLUS!


**About You**
* You like open source and a world of openness in general
* You want to make a difference and get rewarded by working hard
* You are a hacker when it comes to get things done quickly
* You also have a product mindset
* You like elegant design and robust solutions
* You are accountable for what you have created


**About Us**
We're a small tech startup based in London and Tallinn, working on a new type of payment system able to change the rules of global commerce.  

We empower people worldwide to do more with their money by converting idle capital into working realtime streams. Making capital more efficient means we can do more with less, increasing people independence and overall happiness.


**What You’ll Do**
* Write the reactJS based web application that streamlines the user experience of using our network.
* Be agile and ready to pivot to writing new web applications at speed according to new customer stories.
* Create necessary solutions for onboarding new partners.
* Work closely with our CTO, backed developers and UX/UI desingers.


**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in ReactJS
* Write clear documentation
* Love well tested code
* Strong English verbal and written communication abilities
* Experience on Ethereum dapps (web3.js or ether.js) a big PLUS
* Blockchain industry experience a PLUS


**Requirements**
* Based in Tallinn
* 2 years experience in frontend development


**Benefits**
* 28 days paid holidays 
* Early employees enjoy EXTRA STOCK OPTIONS
* Incentives and bonus structure
* An opportunity to make a REAL difference in the lives of hundreds of thousands of people globally
* Flexible working schedule
* Casual and friendly work environment
* Awesome company retreats once or twice a year

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
As a full stack developer, you will be in charge of writing end to end solutions, from web widget to user portals, that helps the adoption of our settlement solution. If you know Web3 and blockchain technology is a big PLUS.

**About You**

* You like open source and a world of openness in general.
* You want to make a difference and get rewarded by working hard.
* You are a hacker when it comes to get things done quickly.
*   you also have a product mindset,
*   you like elegant design and robust solutions.
* You are accountable for what you have created.


**About Us**

We're a small tech startup based in London and Tallinn, working on a new type of payment system able to change the rules of global commerce.

Imagine you can pay for services, receive salary and save money effortlessly every second, instead of monthly. What you would build here enables this.

we empower people worldwide to do more with their money by converting idle capital into working realtime streams of money. Making capital more efficient means you can do more with less, increasing people's independence and overall happiness.


**Responsibilities**

* Write the reactJS based web applications that streamlines the user experience of using our network.
* Write node.js + mongoDB based backend that connect applications together.
* Have experience with AWS services, including EKS, ECS, etc.
* Be agile and ready to pivot to writing new web applications at speed according to new customer stories.
* Create necessary solutions for onboarding new partners.


**Requirements**

* Proficiency in ReactJS.
* Plenty of experience with node.js, and one application framework such as feathers js or sails js.
* Huge plus if having worked with Ethereum dapps, familiar with web3.js/ether.js.
* Write clear documentation in English.
* Love well tested code.
* REMOTE UNTIL MAY/JUNE, then relocation to Tallinn (Estonia) is required.
* Write "SUPERFLUID ROCKS" in your note when submitting your application, so we know you spent some time reading this job description.


**Benefits**

* Super motivated team, with cutting-edge Ethereum developers
* 28 days paid holidays 
* Early employees enjoy extra stock options
* Incentive and bonus structure
* An opportunity to make a REAL difference in the lives of hundreds of thousands of people globally
* Flexible working schedule
* Casual and friendly work environment

jobs.title: Open Application (Non-Tech Profile)
jobs.description:
We're always looking for talented people, whether they're experienced in business, software, marketing, blockchain, payments, or something else entirely.

If you think your skills or experience will help us on our quest of building realtime finance, we'd love to talk to you.

Suggested requirements:
* Bachelor's degree equivalent in a relevant field.
* Interest in or work experience in blockchain technology.
* Excellent problem solving and analytical skills.
* Ability to work across timezones.
* Superfluid is a private company headquartered in London.

At Superfluid, we admire interesting people with a unique background. We strongly encourage you to apply even if you don’t satisfy all the requirements, and we will get back to you as soon as possible!

jobs.title: UX/UI Designer (Part-Time, 50%)
jobs.description:
**About the job**
We are looking for a talented UX/UI Designer to joing our team as part-time employee/contractor, intrigued by designing the key components of our new online payments product to be launched soon. 

If you also know the basics of graphic design and/or frontend software development, that's a big plus!


**About You**
* Your friends probably hate that all you can think about is design... in fact, you’ve probably had a date or two end early because you kept going on about app designs.
* You’ve read the great product design books by Cagan, Patton, Olsen, Krug.
* Opportunity and challenges excite you. You love the startup phase and taking companies beyond the founders limitations.
* You are able to take the big picture, break it into small steps and excite people... you’re a natural leader!
* Degree or not, we only focus on results. You've done some absolutely awesome designs!

 
**About Us**
We're a small tech startup based in London and Tallinn, working on a new type of payment system able to change the rules of global commerce.  

We empower people worldwide to do more with their money by converting idle capital into working realtime streams. Making capital more efficient means we can do more with less, increasing people independence and overall happiness.

We are seeking an experienced UI/UX designer to design unforgettable experiences for our users. We are building a work environment that will continually challenge our team members as they expand their knowledge, skills, and abilities in a rapid moving environment.


**What You’ll Do**
* Work closely with our founders to bring our Web3.0 payment system to life, designing the full users experience and the product interface
* Conduct user interviews
* Develop user story maps
* Translate product concepts and requirements into an end-to-end user experience
* Present product designs to the broader team and company
* Work closely with marketing to design landing pages and ensure adherence to brand styles
* Build frameworks, style guides, workflows, etc.
* Build interactive prototypes to test ideas and communicates them internally and externally


**Qualifications**
* Strong English verbal and written communication abilities
* Experince in Agile development
* Experience developing user story maps
* Basics of Graphic Design a PLUS
* Basics of Frontend Development a PLUS
* Blockchain industry experience a PLUS


**Requirements**
* REMOTE UNTIL MAY/JUNE 2020, than based in London or Tallinn, or remote if necessary. 
* Write "SUPERFLUID ROCKS" in your note when submitting your application, just a trick we use to filter spam coming our way ;)


**Benefits**
* 28 days paid holidays (for full time employees)
* Early employees enjoy extra stock options.
* Incentive and bonus structure
* An opportunity to make a REAL difference in the lives of hundreds of thousands of people globally
* Flexible working schedule
* Casual and friendly work environment
* Awesome company retreats once or twice a year
